commit_msg:
Merge pull request #403 from tnguyen-ornl/tnguyen/fix-gate-merge-opt-qcor

Fixed a bug when the gate merge optimizer didn't persist the buffer name
annotator_comment: The compiler (which in this framework is named qcor) assignes a random name to a register representing a buffer, but during an optimization step the name of the register is lost, and substituted with a generic "q".
